title: R+AI 2025
text:
Join us at R+AI 2025, our inaugural conference dedicated to the open-source R community and every facet of artificial intelligence.


Dates: Nov 12–13, 2025


Location: 100% online


Program, speakers, and registration: Coming Soon


Call for Proposals: Open Now!
Whether you’re just getting started with machine learning, experimenting with large language models in R, leveraging GenAI tools to accelerate your code, part of an industry team deploying AI solutions in finance, healthcare, or marketing, or a researcher pushing the boundaries of deep learning or responsible AI—there’s something here for you.
Experience inspiring keynotes and talks, hands-on workshops, lightning talks, and panel discussions designed to educate, connect, and empower R users at every level.

Talks will be recorded

Speakers participate in live Q&A

Schedule is US Eastern Time Zone

title: About R+AI
text: R+AI 2025 is an R Consortium event focused on artificial intelligence with R. The program spans keynotes, talks, workshops, lightning talks, and panels.

title: About R+AI
text:
Goals

Showcase practical AI with R across industries.
Share advances in modeling, GenAI, and responsible AI.
Connect the community through hands-on learning.

Dates: Nov 12–13, 2025
Location: 100% online
Recordings: Talks will be recorded
Community: Speakers participate in live Q&A
Time Zone: Schedule is US Eastern Time Zone
Registration: Coming Soon! Industry, Academia, and Student level ticketing will all be available

title: Call for Proposals
text: Join us at R+AI 2025, our inaugural conference dedicated to the open-source R community and every facet of artificial intelligence. Whether you’re just getting started with machine learning, experimenting with large language models in R, leveraging GenAI tools to accelerate your code, part of an industry team deploying AI solutions in finance, healthcare, or marketing, or a researcher pushing the boundaries of deep learning or responsible AI—there’s something here for you. Experience inspiring keynotes and talks, hands-on workshops, lightning talks, and panel discussions designed to educate, connect, and empower R users at every level.

title: Call for Proposals
text:
Key dates

CFP closes: September 5, 2025

Submit your proposal here

title: Call for Proposals
text:
Formats

Talks (20–25 min)

Lightning talks (5–7 min)

Workshops (2–3 hours)

Panels (45–60 min)
